Значения

Мнемоника

  • Сокращение. Выставлять напоказ 売 через словесные 言 примеры, воспитание, декламация, чтение.

  • Он сказал 言: "Прочтите это бестселлер (как 売)".

Варианты

讀, 读

koohiiStory1: Read the WORDS used to SELL things.

jp_example_words:
購読(こうどく): subscription (e.g. magazine)
講読(こうどく): reading, translation
読者(どくしゃ): reader
読み上げる(よみあげる): to read out loud (and clearly), to call a roll
朗読(ろうどく): reading aloud, recitation
句読点(くとうてん): punctuation marks
読書(どくしょ): reading
読み(よみ): reading
読む(よむ): read
jp_readingExamples: 読書 (どくしょ), 音読 (おんどく), 購読 (こうどく), 読本 (どくほん), 読む (よ.む)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You have to say what you’re selling because people don’t like to read. If they walk right by and don’t read, you better say what you have for sale so they’ll know! Read it out loud to them.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine reading what you have for sale out loud to people walking by because they’re too lazy to read it for themselves.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: What are you forced to read aloud to sell? Yo-yo (よ) instructions! You’d think they’d be self explanatory, but there are actually a lot of rules and tricks that you have to read to get good at yo-yoing. Read all of these out loud so you can sell them.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine reading through your list of yo-yo tricks. Do you know how to pronounce those weird yo-yo names?
Ru_Radicals: 儿 (ножки), 冖 (ва), 士 (воин), 言 (слово)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you'd sell (売) words (言) to read

dú
яп. вм. 读

読

Значения

Читать

Мнемоника

  • Сокращение. Выставлять напоказ 売 через словесные 言 примеры, воспитание, декламация, чтение.

  • Он сказал 言: "Прочтите это бестселлер (как 売)".

Варианты

讀, 读

Radicals: 言, 売  (say, sell)
Meaning Mnemonic
You have to say what you’re selling because people don’t like to read. If they walk right by and don’t read, you better say what you have for sale so they’ll know! Read it out loud to them.
Imagine reading what you have for sale out loud to people walking by because they’re too lazy to read it for themselves.
Reading Mnemonic
What are you forced to read aloud to sell? Yo-yo (よ) instructions! You’d think they’d be self explanatory, but there are actually a lot of rules and tricks that you have to read to get good at yo-yoing. Read all of these out loud so you can sell them.
Imagine reading through your list of yo-yo tricks. Do you know how to pronounce those weird yo-yo names?

Examples: 読書 (どくしょ), 音読 (おんどく), 購読 (こうどく), 読本 (どくほん), 読む (よ.む)
儿 (ножки), 冖 (ва), 士 (воин), 言 (слово)
